title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: Edgar Allan Poe’s scientific prophecy, a desperate World War II naval mission, the hope and heartbreak of Mets’ fandom, the reign of Serena Williams on the court and more.
body:
The author of ‘The Tell-Tale Heart’ set out to explain the cosmos. He got a lot right. Review by Jeremy McCarter.
Read the review
Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings found deep creative wellsprings in her adopted Florida home. Review by Sarah Harrison Smith.
Read the review
